Package com.here.platform.location.core.graph.javadsl

Interface DirectedGraph<V,E>

All Superinterfaces:
IncidenceGraph<V,E>
All Known Implementing Classes:
FilteredGraph
public interface DirectedGraph<V,E> extends IncidenceGraph<V,E>
Represents a graph that allows expanding vertices to get their outgoing edges.
